full_threads.body: Logged 3 hours to Harvest (FEB 26)
3hours madam @rica

@glen please add your time. Cheers
@rica please record this time in 'Feb'. Cheers

Hi Lucy, 

Confirming we have made the requested changes for the 1912 collection across all three sites. Please let us know if you need anything else?

Hey,

Can we have this page fixed up and matched to AU ASAP?

https://acoufelt.com/product/1912-collection/

Could we also please have this home page banner rolled out to ROW site, but see if we can move the text closer to the LHS of the page to match our other banners?



Thanks

Thanks

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman

Marketing Manager

Level 4, 108 King William Street, Adelaide SA 5000

acoufelt.com

Hey there,

Latest digital booklet for 1912 collection attached.

Could you please add this to the download section as a 'product booklet' on the AU, ROW and also the US 1912 product pages.

Thanks!

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

Sure, here is a 2min video to run you through the below:
https://www.loom.com/share/db8cb795f829489abf653fcef65690da

We will add the post the US and ROW site shortly.

Morning Heath,

I uploaded a news story this morning but for some reason 'Previous/Next' text appears in quick view on the news page (attached screenshot). I can't seem to find where this is located in elementor.

Also, I am trying to find the area to upload a new image to the homepage carousel and I can't seem to find that either.

And Lucy has asked if you could load up the Pophouse News page onto the US & ROW site as well

Warm regards,

Keenan Druce

Graphic Designer

Hey Heath,

I see! Thanks for that.

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

Hi Lucy, 

Sure, confirming we have set that up. You will notice it's via a redirect as the AU site is a product page and the US page is a landing page. 

Either way the link will be resolved.

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hey Heath, Just a couple of minor edits to be made are:
  • In the copy change all 'collections' to lowercase
  • In the 'Designs' section update 'George' to 'Louis' on the hover state
  • Update the Louis artwork image (it has some weird squares on it) See attached
  • Can you catergorise the Colourways by their collection, currently they are all over the place. I actually noticed that the file name is pretty long so I have condensed their names as well as placing them in numerical order. Link here
  • Under the 'Specifications' 'Product Detail' can you make the TM next to QuietPrint small, remove LEED/USGBC logo, add '*conditions apply' under guarantees (to match the spec sheet)
  • Digital booklet and spec sheet needs to be added (sent in previous email) and please update install guide from 'Honeycomb' to regular wall panels (use: https://acoufelt.com/au/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2020/05/Acoufelt-Wall-Panel-Installation-Guide_2020.pdf)
Thanks! Warm regards, Lucy Pittman Marketing Manager t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hey Lucy and Keenan, 

Here is the draft 1912 page: https://acoufelt.com/au/product/1912-by-pophouse/

We have used the current fonts on the website for consistency and adapted the design. Let us know if you would like us to use the fonts in the in actual design though.
Logged 2hrs to Harvest

hi madam @rica 2hours
@heath please check. ty

https://acoufelt.com/au/product/1912-by-pophouse/
